Diamond::

Lowers her gun. "Hey,  your good, very good, why not join us. You 
don't much to lose."  Takiner her cue from Devilduer


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> "Quit firin' for a sec," DevilDuer says to Diamond as he steps 
> forward, lowering his gun.
> 
> "Hey," he says to Vamprah, squinting into the darkness, "We don' 
> really wanna kill ya. If you stop tryin' to get away so much, we'll 
> stop firin'. All we need to do is ask you a few questions, and 
maybe 
> make a proposition."
> 
> He had no idea why he said that last part, but he figured that if 
> she's good enough to get this far, she'd do good in the Alliance.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > ::Vamprah::
> > 
> > Vamprah had to do  big sforce to hold a curse while she moved 
> again. 
> > Two were inside and NOT ONE!!!!!
> > 
> > She could face them but she couldn't win... What should she do?...
> > 
> > Her memories gave her the answered... an old advice of a old 
> > transformer who survived the Great War: "If ya're ready to live 
> will 
> > die.. but if you're ready to die, you could have a chance to 
> survive."
> > 
> > "I'm ready to fight and  die" she though. She should be moving 
> until 
> > she find out the way to scape of that mosusetrap that Darkfate 
had 
> > put in?"
